Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary decision to assign a user story to a sprint backlog

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Select whether a feature is included in a release plan

Name: allocate_worker_to_team
Description: Assign a worker to a specific team for a sprint

Name: set_task_priority_level
Description: Set discrete priority level for a task

Name: schedule_daily_scrum_duration
Description: Choose the planned Daily Scrum duration in minutes

Name: budget_allocation_per_project
Description: Continuous budget allocated to a project

Name: limit_wip_tasks_per_board
Description: Set WIP cap (cards) on the Scrum board

Name: assign_scrum_master_to_team
Description: Assign a Scrum Master to a team

Name: prioritize_user_story
Description: Set ordering priority for a user story

Name: estimate_story_points
Description: Estimate story points for a user story

Name: set_team_size
Description: Choose the planned team size for a sprint
